rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSC3041, PSC3211, PSC3231}
(Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, P3002})
Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSC3041, PSC3211, PSC3231}

description: This unit will explore the regulatory aspects of the development and commercialisation of pharmaceutical products, including quality, intellectual property, market authorisation, dossier submission processes and  marketing.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
